sentences.english: The central bank official said those that are out already are legal tender.
sentences.chinese: 银行表示已经流通出去这些错币已经是法币了。

sentences.english: Now it is just “fiat money, ” backed only by the “full faith and credit” of the United States government.
sentences.chinese: 现在这些“法币”是建立在美国政府的信誉之上。

sentences.english: By fiat, he means that it has value only because the Fed says it does.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，法币的价值只因为美联储说它可以。
